alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Ochoco-John Day Highlands; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 11:25AM PST until January 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Some areas could see gusts above 70 mph. * WHERE...The Grande Ronde Valley, Ochoco-John Day Highlands and Wallowa County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These winds will be coming to an end this afternoon.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Ochoco-John Day Highlands; Wallowa County
